definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: The Knicks will score, but not as much as the Celtics.
sentences.chinese: 尼克斯可以不断取分，但会发现总是不如凯尔特人多。

sentences.english: That "future" could be with the team or as part of a trade, and playing inconsistently does not help the Celtics in either scenario.
sentences.chinese: 而不稳定的表现在任何一个方面都不能帮助凯尔特人。

sentences.english: After Houston, we have a very tough 4-game east coast road trip against Detroit, Boston, Philly and New Jersey.
sentences.chinese: 之后我们又要去东海岸和凯尔特人等强队进行交手。

sentences.english: The sources say the Celtics are having internal discussions regarding a swap of marquee point guards.
sentences.chinese: 线报称凯尔特人正进行控卫互换的相关内部讨论。

sentences.english: I find this Scythe of the Celt to be quite a disturbing force.
sentences.chinese: 我发现凯尔特人的这把大镰刀相当是干扰的力量。

sentences.english: Danny Ainge made some nice deals for Boston.
sentences.chinese: Ainge为凯尔特人做了几笔不错的交易。

sentences.english: Alston will serve his suspension Friday when the Magic host the Celtics.
sentences.chinese: 周五魔术将主场迎战凯尔特人，阿尔斯通将缺席。

sentences.english: Celtic became dangerous only thanks to dangerous free kicks by Nakamura.
sentences.chinese: 凯尔特人唯一的威胁来自中村俊辅的任意球。
是的，凯尔特人是不同的。

sentences.english: The original population of Iceland was of Nordic and Celtic origin.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛的人口起源北欧人和凯尔特人。

sentences.english: The Celtics need Allen to find a rhythm from the outside.
sentences.chinese: 凯尔特人需要雷阿伦找到外线进攻的节奏。
它下意识的透露出爱尔兰凯尔特人的气息。

sentences.english: In this series, Boston couldn’t keep up.
sentences.chinese: 在这个系列赛中，凯尔特人没能挺住。

sentences.english: Ince toyed with the Celtic defence before clipping a delightful ball into the path of Suso.
sentences.chinese: 因斯风骚的技术一次次培植著凯尔特人的防线。

sentences.english: Trading Allen also likely will signify the end of the Celtics' current title run.
sentences.chinese: 而交易阿伦也意味着现在的这支凯尔特人走到头了。

sentences.english: The ancient Celts believed that wearing masks would ward offevil spirits.
sentences.chinese: 古凯尔特人相信戴上面具可以避开邪灵。

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
Los Angeles Lakers/abbr. for 洛杉磯湖人|洛杉矶湖人[Luo4 shan1 ji1 Hu2 ren2]
